text: Body Brokers is an upcoming American crime drama film written and directed by John Swab and starring Frank Grillo, Jessica Rothe, Michael K. Williams, and Melissa Leo. ==Cast== *Frank Grillo as Vin *Jessica Rothe as May *Michael K. Williams as Wood *Melissa Leo as Dr. White *Peter Greene as Dr. Riner *Alice Englert as Opal *Thomas Dekker as Jacko *Jack Kilmer as Utah *Billy Blair as Chickie *Renée Willett as Penny *Owen Campbell as Sid *Sam Quartin as Tina *Rachelle Wright as Pool Girl ==Production== Principal photography took place in August 2019 in Oklahoma. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Upcoming films Category:American films Category:American crime drama films Category:Films shot in Oklahoma
title: Body Brokers
